o Concerning features of variable decelerations:
 Reduced variability within the deceleration
 Failure or slow return to baseline FHR after the end of the contraction
 Loss of pre and post deceleration shouldering (abrupt brief increases in FHR baseline)
 Lasting more than 60 seconds
